member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.ExportStarted
member.summary: Occurs before the FormattedTextEditor export begins.

remarks.p: The is a copy of the original formattedText which can be manipulated by the user.
This event is fired before all other events when the method is called. You can use it to do any preprocessing before exporting process starts.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.ExportEnding
member.summary: Occurs when Formatted Text Editor export is about to end.

remarks.p: This event is fired after the exporting process is complete but the writer is still not closed.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.ExportEnded
member.summary: Occurs after Formatted Text Editor export is finished.

remarks.p: This event is fired after the exporting process is finished and is fired after all other events.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.HyperlinkExporting
member.summary: Occurs before the FormattedTextEditor hyperlink export begins.

remarks.p: The is a copy of the original hyperlink which can be manipulated by the user.
The is a copy of the original hyperlink which can be manipulated by the user.
The is a copy of the original hyperlink which can be manipulated by the user.
This event is fired before all other events when the method is called. You can use it to do any preprocessing before exporting process starts.

member.summary: Occurs before the FormattedTextEditor text node export begins.

remarks.p: The is a copy of the original hyperlink which can be manipulated by the user.
This event is fired before all other events when the method is called. You can use it to do any preprocessing before exporting process starts.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.HyperlinkExported
member.summary: Occurs before the FormattedTextEditor hyperlink export begins.

remarks.p: The is a copy of the original hyperlink which can be manipulated by the user.

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.ImageExported

member.name: E:Infragistics.Win.UltraWinFormattedText.WordWriter.UltraFormattedTextWordWriter.TextExported
member.summary: Occurs before the FormattedTextEditor text node export ends.

remarks.p: The is a copy of the text which is exported to word.
This event is fired before all other events when the method is called. You can use it to do any preprocessing before exporting process starts.
